steps.name: When enter "generated_test_automation_company_name" in company field in "top section"
When enter "test_automation_good_name" in goods field in "top section"
When enter "automation.emk@gmail.com" in email field in "top section"
When click on country flag button in "top section"
When click on russia button in "top section"
When enter "1231231212" in phone field in "top section"
When click on submit button in "top section"
Then text "Thank you for your message" is displayed
